author: Robyn Stevens
title: Winnie Sun Joins ModernMom with Her New Program, “Renegade Mom TV with Winnie Sun"
text:
Exciting news for both Winnie Sun and ModernMom.com: Winnie will be joining Modern Mom with her new program, “Renegade Mom TV with Winnie Sun.” Winnie Sun is a wealth manager and modern mom who values compassion & patience not only in her career, but in her everyday life. Prior to entering the financial planning industry, Winnie was an entrepreneur in the media sector. She owned and operated CH Entertainment, a Los Angeles production company, with clients including America’s Funniest Home Videos, Jeopardy!, Wheel of Fortune and Judge Judy. Her experience as an executive gave her additional insight into the investment needs of business owners, large and small, and their families. http://www.modernmom.com “As a mother of three, I’ve been a fan of the Modern Mom community for some time,” says Winnie. “Once Brooke and I met, we hit off immediately, and I told her that I’d be honored to join the family. I am so excited to share some money tips to get families excited about financial health. Most of all, we’re doing so via video so that the whole family can enjoy.”
Winnie is now the Managing Director and Founding Partner of Sun Group Wealth Partners. Her unique experience working as a wealth manager and as the founder of the Campaign for Next Generation Employees gives her the perfect insight to partner with ModernMom for her new program. Sharing her vision with others is what inspired Winnie to create Renegade Mom TV. The program will be short “how-to” videos on some of the most popular money-related topics. From saving money online to planning for your child’s education, no topic is off limits, and everything will be made simple. And most importantly, every show will leave you feeling a little more empowered over your money. As a mother of three young boys, Winnie knows that planning for college and the success of our children is at the forefront of every parent’s mind. http://www.modernmom.com
"We're so excited to welcome Winnie to our ModernMom team!” says Brook Burke-Charvet, CEO of Modern Mom. “I believe in the importance of surrounding oneself with experts in their respective fields, and Winnie certainly qualifies as that. Every family needs sound financial advice, so Winnie is a fabulous addition."
ModernMom is the premiere destination for moms; a trusted resource for the "Woman Behind the Mom," with practical tips, advice, videos and information on parenting, pregnancy, family, career, health, beauty, cooking, crafts and more. It is headed up by television host Brooke Burke-Charvet and Lisa Rosenblatt. ModernMom is full of original content from celebrated experts, authors, bloggers and real moms from all over the world. This comprehensive online magazine community is a one-stop destination for smart, savvy and soulful women who want to be informed, entertained and inspired. http://www.modernmom.com
ModernMom has been wildly successful and has a huge following on many social media platforms; boasting 1.3 Million on UMV, 231,000 on Twitter, over 1 million on Google+, over 50,000 on Facebook, and 5000 on Instagram. This has allowed them to reach billions of viewers all around the world. http://www.modernmom.com
You won’t want to miss out on a single video! Here is what we have lined up to kick off Renegade Mom TV:
1. Keep or Shred (important docs).
2. College financial planning/529.
3. Internet shopping tips.
4. Financial tips for bloggers.
Keep in touch with Winnie on Twitter, LinkedIn and check out her articles on Forbes.com.
Keep up with all things ModernMom on Twitter, Facebook and YouTube.
